channel.title: Linux on 程序猿的小本本
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on 程序猿的小本本

item.title: curl: (35) SSL connect error
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description: curl: (35) SSL connect error解决办法 原因nss和libcurl版本过低导致的，解决办法升级。 centos命令 sudo yum update nss curl -y

item.title: netinstall centos5
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description: 网络安装CentOs5 目前CentOs官方已经停止支持CentOS5了，最新的版本是5.11。 为了快速安装系统，使用了 netinstall.iso。 CentOS的安装URL与网上的教程不匹配了。 我这里简单记录一下 用netinstall.iso 做boot启动系统 原图无效请戳这里http://img1.51cto.com/attachment/201008/162309384.jpg 选择HTTP方式, 并按照您的实际情况配置网络 建议使用NAT方式和自动分配IP方式 旧版教程中 Web Site name 要填入 vault.centos.org CentOS directory 要填入 5.11/os/x86_64 如果你要装的是32位请把x86_64替换为i386 参考: http://zh888.blog.51cto.com/1684752/380118

item.title: unknown_u16_type
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description: issue: gcc build error error: unknown type name ‘u16’ solution: install kernel-headers sudo yum install kernel-headers -y referer: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?format=multiple&id=689756

item.title: mount NTFS on linux
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description: #how to mount a ntfs partition/drive on linux linux may not integrate ntfs driver, so you need install ntfs-3g ntfs-3g is an opensource ntfs driver for linux #yum install ntfs-3g detect your ntfs partition name parted is an gnu partition tool that can analize disk like fdisk which support GPT #parted >print all find you ntfs partition name. eg. /dev/sdb1 mount #mkdir /mnt/ntfs #mount -t ntfs-3g /dev/sdb1 /mnt/ntfs now you can vist /mnt/ntfs

item.title: 没有找到visudo - not found sudo
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description: ##没有找到sudo/visudo – not found sudo/visudo 买了一个VPS，新建了一个普通用户，想给配置个sudo权限时发现既没有visudo 也没有/etc/sudoers 错误信息: -bash: sudo: command not found -bash: visudo: command not found 解决办法 yum install sudo 注： 未在ubuntu下进行测试

item.title: linux 安装最新版本的git
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description: #linux 安装最新版本的git 下载源代码 https://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/ 最新版本为2.10.0 wget https://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/git-2.10.0.tar.gz 安装依赖环境(以CentOS为例) sudo yum install -y openssl-devel libpcre-devel perl-ExtUtils-Embed libcurl-devel 配置安装 tar xvf git-2.10.0.tar.gz cd git-2.10.0 ./configure --with-openssl --with-libpcre --with-expat --with-curl make sudo make install 说明： --with-openssl --with-libpcre --with-expat --with-curl选项开启支持https 如果不安装perl-ExtUtils-Embed可能导致编译失败

item.title: pyenv rehash problem
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description: #pyenv rehash problem description: pyenv: cannot rehash: /home/XXX/.pyenv/shims/.pyenv-shim exists fixup: rm /home/XXX/.pyenv/shims/.pyenv-shim exists pyenv rehash && hash -r pyenv rehash && rehash note: replace XXX with your real username reference: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/29753592/pyenv-shim-not-created-when-installing-package-using-setup-py
